name: Chill Out (itch) (FeatureKreep)
description:
In the future, rain and sunshine aren't a matter of chance, but a matter of choice.

You, a climate control operator, is tasked with helping a delivery bot get the package to the destination by manipulating the weather.

Made for Level Up Circle Jam 2021 (theme: "Temperature is key")

Controls

Click on icons to change the weather

Sun — melts ice, makes flowers grow

Cloud — neutral

Rain — fills spaces with water, makes sprouts bloom

Snow — freezes water, makes flowers wither

Credits

Art & coding: @FeatureKreep

Music: Eric Matyas

Want to support me? You can donate to my Ko-fi ☕
